descriptionlist.description:
Compatible with iOS 7, 8 and 9
Supports iPhone, iPod Touch & iPad
3 days FREE trial, Commercial Package $1.99

Tage is awesome multitasking gestures and more.

Features:
• Close App or Activate Switcher
- Swipe up from the bottom edge to close app or activate App Switcher (Long swipe up to close app and quit background).• • • Switch Apps
- Swipe from left and right edge to switch apps.

• Quick Switcher
- slide in from the bottom left or right corner of the screen to quickly switch apps.

• Lock Device
- Can set gestures to lock device.

• Switcher Page Action
- Home page swipe down to show action menu (Power Off, Reboot, Safe Mode, Respring, Lock).
- App page swipe down to show action menu (Quit all Apps, Quit Background Apps, Quit Other Apps).

功能:

• 返回主屏幕或激活多任務
從屏幕底部邊緣向上滑動來返回主屏幕或激活多任務管理(向上長距離滑動關閉程序並退出後台)。

• 切換程序
從屏幕左邊或右邊滑入屏幕來切換程序。

• 快速切換
快速切換程序，從屏幕左下角或右下角劃入屏幕來快速切換程序。

• 鎖定機器
可設置多個手勢來鎖定機器。

• 任務管理界面卡片動作
- 首頁卡片下滑來顯示電源選項(關機，重啟，安全模式，註銷，鎖屏)。
- 程序卡片下滑來顯示關閉後台選項(關閉所有程序，關閉後台程序，關閉其他程序)。

No icon is added to the homescreen. Configure options from Settings app.

Official website: www.clezz.com
